attributes.action: Freeze Business Rates for Startups and Small Businesses until 2024
attributes.additional_details:
Small shops need OUR help otherwise we will have even more houses which is what is causing the MASSIVE strain on the NHS.

The Love Local Hub was only open for 18 days in the centre:MK and we put £25000 back into the pockets of small businesses. 

Even as a CIC / Social Enterprise there is no guarantee we will get a reduction on business rates. For our location this is £50,000 to £100,000.

If you love small family businesses, local shops, shopping centres etc

THEN you must sign this please.
attributes.background: Currently Business Rates have been paused until 03/2021 but many shops are currently facing permanent closure due the way small businesses have been excluded. We want to come back after covid but we need a break from business rates to help us recover ASAP.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551737

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
